summary: Lester Bryant Bird  was the second Prime Minister of Antigua and Barbuda from 1994 to 2004. He is also a well-known athlete.
full_text: Sir Lester Bryant Bird, KNH  was the second Prime Minister of Antigua and Barbuda from 1994 to 2004 and a well-known athlete. He was chairman of the Antigua Labour Party  from 1971 to 1983, then became Prime Minister when his father, Sir Vere Bird, the previous Prime Minister, resigned.
title: Lester Bird
